snippet.title: LEGO Hill Climb Adventures - Launch Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Set off on a grand adventure as you brave the hills in LEGO® Hill Climb Adventures, a single-player exploration game where the iconic Hill Climb Racing and LEGO worlds collide!

Select from a variety of Hill Climb Racing and LEGO vehicles and conquer the classic Climb Canyon peaks! Using the familiar, fun gameplay of Hill Climb Racing, this brand-new game adds twists and extra depth to the beloved original formula with the addition of exploration, adventures and stories for you to discover!

Adventure awaits, one brick at a time!

FUN STORIES
Meet unique LEGO Hill Climb Adventures characters with exciting storylines and various missions for you to undertake and complete.

VEHICLES AND GADGETS
With a variety of vehicles for you to drive, each with their own active and passive gadgets there's a vast amount of potential combinations to help you on your adventure!

UPGRADE AND IMPROVE
Collect coins and bricks scattered throughout the levels to permanently boost the power of your vehicles!

HIDDEN PATHS AND SECRETS
Explore each level thoroughly, as they will have multiple paths for you to traverse and sneakily hidden secrets for you to discover!

MEET THE MINIFIGURES
LEGO Hill Climb Adventures brings a host of memorable characters from Climb Canyon, allowing you to meet various lovable, quirky characters!

TEST YOUR SKILLS
Figure out the best way to complete the missions given to you by the Minifigure residents of the world by selecting your vehicle and equipped gadgets carefully. Some combinations work better for certain missions!

DOWNLOAD FOR FREE: https://lhca.onelink.me/cazL/9jkoquhx 

Discover LEGO Hill Climb Adventures on:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/HillClimbRacing 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hillclimbracing_official
X (Formerly Twitter): https://twitter.com/HCR_Official_


Learn more about LEGO Hill Climb Adventures: https://fingersoft.com/playlhca/
